data.message: Hey, Why is it, that Facebook users can not pull & drag their posts to the order in which they desire them to be displayed to the public?

replies.message: Hi Richard. We don't currently offer that feature, but we'll take your suggestion back to our team. Please keep the great feedback coming! -Joe
Or something like the "Pinned Post" option for personal profiles. That could be neat.

Facebook 
Thanks for your help
We’ll take a look at the documents you submitted and get back to you. If we need more help confirming your name, we’ll reach out for additional documentation.                                                                                               .                                                                                                                                      .                                                                                                                                                         

Whats this Error ? And Now i how Can Fix it ? Plz Ask Me ? This Is My Family Account . I Want My Mother Pics . Plz Help me ?

Facebook - I definitely miss the ability to rearrange photo albums into our desired order. Please, please, please bring that feature back.

And it would definitely be useful to add older posts, especially on pages, to our desired order as well.

All you'd have to do is add that option in the "schedule a post" section, by allowing us to backdate the date.
